content: the mon scarf is a simple design making it a perfect project if you are new to crochet it s equally suitable for the more advanced crocheter who wants a relaxing and meditative make it s also customizable for a longer scarf chain a greater number of chains than stated in the pattern for a shorter scarf chain a lesser number of chains than stated it s worked lengthwise so you can choose how wide you want your scarf as you crochet for a wider scarf simply crochet more row finished measurements 72 x 7 5 / 182cm x 19cm
